title: Cannabis Stocks: Once In A Generation Opportunity - No Hyperbole
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Cannabis stocks are a good deal right now - don't be afraid to put more money in. That's what Ted Waller, esteemed Seeking Alpha contributor, 50 year market veteran and cannabis investor, says. We agree! We also discuss how to know when to pull the trigger on a stock, favoring the extraction model going forward (oils over flower), ETFs vs. stocks, MJ's dividend and Ted's top picks in the space. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
